Description:

PC-version of the new project world-famous series, 
tells the story of ill-confrontation reasonable 
fighting robots. Win the war, which became the 
beginning of the great confrontation! War that 
erupted long before the Transformers came to Earth. 
War for dominance in the Cybertron - home planet of 
mighty robots. Two large-scale campaigns allow 
everyone to make a choice: to protect Cybertron, 
speaking on the side of the noble Autobots, or 
attempt to enslave the planet, fighting in the ranks of the treacherous Decepticons.

Features:

Fight on the side of the Autobots or Decepticons 
in two unique campaigns.Create your own transformer 
and take part in immense online battles.At any time, 
turn all the robot fighting in the vehicle.Complete 
the campaign mode of playing together for three participants.

Description:

Battle for the planet Cybertron entering a decisive phase. 
Brutal Decepticons and Autobots opposing them prepare for 
the final blow that should put a final end to the protracted 
conflict. Become a witness and a direct participant in the 
greatest events in the history of the epic saga of Transformers 
managing the most popular cars of all reasonable times.

In the new game industry awaits unprecedented scale of destruction. 
Before you open the dark pages of the extinction of the ancient 
civilization mired in the horrors of war of annihilation. 
Use the unique powers of the Transformers to emerge victorious 
from the fight with the indestructible T-Rex form from the 
Braves and legendary Boevikonami. Destroy enemies in the exciting 
single player campaign, dedicated to both sides of the conflict, 
or challenge opponents in multiplayer!

Features:

Gripping story: the epic story of the war between the Autobots 
and Decepticons on their home planet.New and unique gameplay: 
exceptional skills and abilities of the Transformers.New characters: 
Grimlock, Bruticus, Metroplex, Insecticons and others.
Single-player campaign: Exciting single player campaign, 
dedicated to both sides of the conflict.

Memory: 2 GB
Video: 512 MB, Geforce 8800 GT / Radeon HD4850, DirectX 9.0c
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX Ã‚Â® 9.0

Description:

Transformers: Rise Of The Dark Spark connects universes Cybertron 
Transformers series and movies directed by Michael Bay (Michael Bay). 
The project will be 40 playable characters. You have to hunt for a 
powerful artifact Dark Spark. During the passage of a single campaign 
for the Autobots or Decepticons you can switch between the characters. 
Transformers: Rise Of The Dark Spark will offer dynamic battle in 
large-scale co-op mode konfliktah.Budet present escalation (Escalation) 
for 4 people. It is necessary to withstand the waves of enemies. 
It added more improved protection and characters. In Transformers: 
Rise Of The Dark Spark has a single development system for multiplayer 
and single player. As you progress you will unlock new characters, 
weapons, special abilities and bonuses.

Features:

More than 40 characters from two different universes!
Transformed when necessary: Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Easily switch between robot and art forms!
Fight on Earth and Cybertron in an unforgettable battle for dark spark.
Epic network battles: Advanced network mode of passing a joint to 4 players, 
"Escalation" with new, improve the defensive fortifications and dangerous 
powerful enemies!The new system rewards: Levels can also be obtained 
in the campaign and escalations, allowing the player to receive the 
award, which will help in the passage of all modes!
